title: South Korean Crypto Exchanges Prepare for Tightened Reserves Requirements
description: Starting from next month, South Korean crypto exchanges with "real-name" bank accounts must maintain a minimum $2.3 million reserve fund.

title: SEC Charges Impact Theory Faces Over Unregistered NFT ‘Securities’
description: The SEC has charged LA-based Impact Theory for the unregistered offering of NFTs, spotlighting the need for clear regulatory frameworks.

title: AMP Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is AMP a Good Investment?
description: AMP Price Prediction 2023-2032 Amp seeks to enable users to stake tokens without having to transfer them to a smart contract physically. title: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will ETH reach $8000 soon?
description: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032 “The Merge did not change anything for holders/users.” Is that a fact? Crypto prices are unlikely to see a major recovery without new or returning investors bringing cash back into the market. Unless the retail people enter the market, Ethereum won’t strongly blast above ATH. title: Will BRICS Utilize Ripple (XRP) in Its 30% Global Economy Control After Expansion? Report
description: The tendency for BRICS to embrace Ripple (XRP) as its currency is being nursed by supporters. The bloc has continued to expand with the addition of new members. title: Solana Good and Salmon Meh? Crypto Analyst Casts Poll on X
description:
Crypto analyst Adam Cochran, in a recent post, asked the Twitter crypto community to decide between Solana and Salmon. In the poll posted on Tuesday, he explained that Salmon refers to cooked Salmon while Solana refers to existing Solana DeFi projects. At the time of writing, the poll garnered close to 1,350 votes, with many […]

The post Solana Good and Salmon Meh? Crypto Analyst Casts Poll on X appeared first on Coin Edition.
